entry.source: {F812}Mastema\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,351401}I will not let you off as I did when{F801}we met last time. You will rue the day{F801}you crossed me.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Mastema\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,351401}I will not let you off as I did when{F801}we met last time. You will rue the day{F801}you crossed me.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Mastema\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,351402}Urrrrgh... C... Curse you... human...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,351403}You're just... puppets... that can{F801}only move... by being controlled...{F801}Ugh...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,351404}Gah... Oh... Almighty Lord...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,351405}Why...? Am I not the one who was most{F801}faithful to your... will...?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,351406}Curse you... Gabriel... Gah...{F801}
